results.webTitle: Gareth Southgate would drop Wayne Rooney for the good of the team

results.firPara: The Republic of Irelands chances of qualifying for Russia in 2018 are looking rosier after they overcame a mid-match wobble in Moldova to record an eventually comfortable victory, thanks to James McCleans two second-half goals.
results.secPara: It was a win that Martin ONeills side always deserved, and Irish spirits will have been further boosted by Wales dropping points at home to Georgia earlier in the evening, which leaves the Republic second in Group D. However, the manner in which they lost their way and conceded a sloppy equaliser shortly before half-time will concern the Republics manager.
results.webTitle: James McClean’s double drives Republic of Ireland past Moldova in qualifier

results.firPara: James McCleans second half brace made it two wins in four days for Martin ONeills team, leaving them well placed in Group D
results.secPara: James McCleans second half brace made it two wins in four days for Martin ONeills team, leaving them well placed in Group D
results.webTitle: Moldova 1-3 Republic of Ireland: World Cup 2018 qualifier – as it happened!

results.firPara: Between DeVeres stunning equaliser, the Mariners rousing revival and Sydneys thumping derby win its been a busy round
results.secPara: Between DeVeres stunning equaliser, the Mariners rousing revival and Sydneys thumping derby win its been a busy round
results.webTitle: A-League opening round starts with a bang, record crowds, and a few red cards

results.firPara: This was the day when the path to the World Cup finals in Russia started to become more complicated for Wales. Chris Coleman and his players need no telling there is little margin for error in this qualification campaign, especially when their opponents are ranked 137th in the world. Georgia, in fairness, are much better than their record suggests, yet there was no escaping the sense of disappointment at the final whistle among the Wales supporters.
results.secPara: In a tight group that also contains Austria, Republic of Ireland and Serbia, the truth is that a home match against Georgia, who were drawn from pot six, is must-win territory.
results.webTitle: Wales’s World Cup hopes dented by Georgia’s Tornike Okriashvili in draw

results.firPara: Wales led through Gareth Bale but Georgia battled back and could easily have won on a frustrating night in Cardiff for Chris Colemans team
results.secPara: Wales led through Gareth Bale but Georgia battled back and could easily have won on a frustrating night in Cardiff for Chris Colemans team
results.webTitle: Wales 1-1 Georgia: World Cup 2018 qualifier – as it happened!

results.firPara: Lionel Messi knows everything about everything in football, according to the man who convinced him to continue playing for Argentina.
results.secPara: Edgardo Bauza, who took over from Tata Martino as Argentina coach in the summer, recalled his first meeting with Messi and said Leo surprised me even more than I thought. Leo knows everything about everything. Nothing escapes him.
results.webTitle: Lionel Messi 'knows everything about everything,' says Argentina coach Bauza

results.firPara: AFC Wimbledon have reached a historic milestone by climbing above Milton Keynes Dons in the football pyramid for the first time – only 14 years after they were formed.
results.secPara: Neal Ardleys side defeated Oxford United 3-1 to move up to 10th in League One, two places above MK Dons, who lost 1-0 at home to Port Vale. Wimbledon took a 3-0 half-time lead at the Kassam Stadium through Tom Elliott, Darius Charles and Andy Barcham, before a Charles own goal offered Oxford consolation.
results.webTitle: AFC Wimbledon climb above MK Dons in the football pyramid for first time

results.firPara: A starlet at a Premier League club is to be promoted to the first team. His agent has represented him since the age of 16 and they enjoy a good relationship. Then, the manager informs a different registered intermediary (the official term) the player will be catapulted from earning a few hundred pounds a week into the £20,000-a-week bracket. What else is the intermediary, who does not represent the young hopeful, told?
results.secPara: Dan Chapman, a lawyer and intermediary at Full Contact, a sports law firm, takes up the story. This manager says There will be a new contract on the table for him [the player]. Its massive. That means his agent is going to pick up a nice fee. But what I want is to destabilise the relationship between player and agent. The big agents fee will go to you instead.
results.webTitle: Football insiders claim world game is ‘endemically corrupt’ in player transfers

results.firPara: Colorado Rapids clinched a top-two slot in the Western Conference and a playoff bye with a 3-2 victory at Houston Dynamo in MLSs only game of the weekend.
results.secPara: Dominique Badji, the Rapids Senegalese American forward, scored goals in each half to earn the victory, which lifts the Rapids to within two points of conference-leading FC Dallas. Albanian Shklezen Gashi made it 3-1 in the 79th minute, but Mauro Manotas thrashed in a late deflected free-kick two minutes later to make it a nervy last 10 minutes for the visitors.
results.webTitle: Colorado Rapids clinch first-round play-off bye with victory over Houston
